preqs: PSC3231 Pharmaceutical Product ManufacturePSC3041 Applied Analytical Methods

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {PSC3041, PSC3211, PSC3231}
(Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, P3002})
Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {PSC3041, PSC3211, PSC3231}

description: This four week placement provides students with work experience in an industry relevant to the  formulation major.In addition students participate in activities to develop their job seeking and career planning skills, for example, writing resumes, job applications and cover letters, and interview techniques.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
